abstract.text: Configuration for the user interface of the document scanning screen.
Hides the shutter button if set to
. Shows it otherwise.

Overlay color of the camera view.

Foreground color of the detection overlay.
Whether polygon auto snap progress animation is enabled or not.
Color of the shutter buttons outer ring in auto-capture mode.
Background color of the top bar.
